column4: i noticed that with my new keyboard, some of the special media keys don't seem to have corresponding XF86 keys, so I can't get them to do stuff under keyboard shortcuts or whatever
is there any way for me to fix this?
try running  "xev" and pressing them, that'll show if they're recognised; how you set them up is beyond my understanding, though;  if you're lucky, you can just use the shortcut manager in gnome.
yeah, that's what I meant. they're not showing up under xev
